title: Review Corporate Bylaws
description: A client is unsure about the process for electing a new director. In-house counsel needs to review the corporate bylaws to provide an answer.

tasks.description: Locate and open the company's official corporate bylaws.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct governing document.

tasks.description: Search the document for sections related to the 'Board of Directors', 'Elections', and 'Vacancies'.
Summarize the required procedure for electing a new director as outlined in the bylaws.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, step-by-step answer to the client's question.
